tags.name: User
tags.description: Endpoints for retrieving user profile and measurement data.

get.description: Get the cycle for the specified ID

parameters.name: cycleId
parameters.description: ID of the cycle to retrieve

429.description: Request rejected due to rate limiting

500.description: Server error occurred while making request

get.description: Get all physiological cycles for a user, paginated. Results are sorted by start time in descending order.

parameters.name: limit
parameters.description: Limit on the number of cycles returned

parameters.name: start
parameters.description: Return cycles that occurred after or during (inclusive) this time. If not specified, the response will not filter cycles by a minimum time.

parameters.name: end
parameters.description: Return cycles that intersect this time or ended before (exclusive) this time. If not specified, `end` will be set to `now`.

parameters.name: nextToken
parameters.description: Optional next token from the previous response to get the next page. If not provided, the first page in the collection is returned

429.description: Request rejected due to rate limiting

500.description: Server error occurred while making request

get.description: Get the sleep for the specified cycle ID

parameters.name: cycleId
parameters.description: ID of the cycle to retrieve sleep for

429.description: Request rejected due to rate limiting

500.description: Server error occurred while making request

get.description: Get all recoveries for a user, paginated. Results are sorted by start time of the related sleep in descending order.

parameters.name: limit
parameters.description: Limit on the number of recoveries returned

parameters.name: start
parameters.description: Return recoveries that occurred after or during (inclusive) this time. If not specified, the response will not filter recoveries by a minimum time.

parameters.name: end
parameters.description: Return recoveries that intersect this time or ended before (exclusive) this time. If not specified, `end` will be set to `now`.

parameters.name: nextToken
parameters.description: Optional next token from the previous response to get the next page. If not provided, the first page in the collection is returned

429.description: Request rejected due to rate limiting

500.description: Server error occurred while making request

get.description: Get the recovery for a cycle

parameters.name: cycleId
parameters.description: ID of the cycle to retrieve

429.description: Request rejected due to rate limiting

500.description: Server error occurred while making request

get.description: Get the sleep for the specified ID

parameters.name: sleepId
parameters.description: ID of the sleep to retrieve

429.description: Request rejected due to rate limiting

500.description: Server error occurred while making request

get.description: Get all sleeps for a user, paginated. Results are sorted by start time in descending order.

parameters.name: limit
parameters.description: Limit on the number of sleeps returned

parameters.name: start
parameters.description: Return sleeps that occurred after or during (inclusive) this time. If not specified, the response will not filter sleeps by a minimum time.

parameters.name: end
parameters.description: Return sleeps that intersect this time or ended before (exclusive) this time. If not specified, `end` will be set to `now`.

parameters.name: nextToken
parameters.description: Optional next token from the previous response to get the next page. If not provided, the first page in the collection is returned

429.description: Request rejected due to rate limiting

500.description: Server error occurred while making request

get.description: Retrieves the body measurements (height, weight, max heart rate) for the authenticated user.

429.description: Request rejected due to rate limiting

500.description: Server error occurred while making request

get.description: Retrieves the basic profile information (name, email) for the authenticated user.

429.description: Request rejected due to rate limiting

500.description: Server error occurred while making request

delete.description: Revoke the access token granted by the user. If the associated OAuth client is configured to receive webhooks, it will no longer receive them for this user.

429.description: Request rejected due to rate limiting

500.description: Server error occurred while making request

get.description: Get the workout for the specified ID

parameters.name: workoutId
parameters.description: ID of the workout to retrieve

429.description: Request rejected due to rate limiting

500.description: Server error occurred while making request

get.description: Get all workouts for a user, paginated. Results are sorted by start time in descending order.

parameters.name: limit
parameters.description: Limit on the number of workouts returned

parameters.name: start
parameters.description: Return workouts that occurred after or during (inclusive) this time. If not specified, the response will not filter workouts by a minimum time.

parameters.name: end
parameters.description: Return workouts that intersect this time or ended before (exclusive) this time. If not specified, `end` will be set to `now`.

parameters.name: nextToken
parameters.description: Optional next token from the previous response to get the next page. If not provided, the first page in the collection is returned

429.description: Request rejected due to rate limiting

500.description: Server error occurred while making request

id.description: Unique identifier for the physiological cycle

user_id.description: The WHOOP User for the physiological cycle

created_at.description: The time the cycle was recorded in WHOOP

updated_at.description: The time the cycle was last updated in WHOOP

start.description: Start time bound of the cycle

end.description: End time bound of the cycle. If not present, the user is currently in this cycle

timezone_offset.description: The user's timezone offset at the time the cycle was recorded. Follows format for Time Zone Designator (TZD) - '+hh:mm', '-hh:mm', or 'Z'.

externalDocs.description: Learn more about the Time Zone Designator from the W3C Standard

score_state.description: `SCORED` means the cycle was scored and the measurement values will be present. `PENDING_SCORE` means WHOOP is currently evaluating the cycle. `UNSCORABLE` means this activity could not be scored for some reason - commonly because there is not enough user metric data for the time range.

Cycle.description: The collection of records in this page.

strain.description: WHOOP metric of the cardiovascular load - the level of strain  on the user's cardiovascular system based on the user's heart rate during the cycle. Strain is scored on a scale from 0 to 21.

kilojoule.description: Kilojoules the user expended during the cycle.

average_heart_rate.description: The user's average heart rate during the cycle.

max_heart_rate.description: The user's max heart rate during the cycle.

CycleScore.description: WHOOP's measurements and evaluation of the cycle. Only present if the score state is `SCORED`

records.description: The collection of records in this page.

next_token.description: A token that can be used on the next request to access the next page of records. If the token is not present, there are no more records in the collection.

id.description: Unique identifier for the sleep activity

cycle_id.description: Unique identifier for the cycle this sleep belongs to

v1_id.description: Previous generation identifier for the activity. Will not exist past 09/01/2025

user_id.description: The WHOOP User who performed the sleep activity

created_at.description: The time the sleep activity was recorded in WHOOP

updated_at.description: The time the sleep activity was last updated in WHOOP

start.description: Start time bound of the sleep

end.description: End time bound of the sleep

timezone_offset.description: The user's timezone offset at the time the sleep was recorded. Follows format for Time Zone Designator (TZD) - '+hh:mm', '-hh:mm', or 'Z'.

externalDocs.description: Learn more about the Time Zone Designator from the W3C Standard

nap.description: If true, this sleep activity was a nap for the user

score_state.description: `SCORED` means the sleep activity was scored and the measurement values will be present. `PENDING_SCORE` means WHOOP is currently evaluating the sleep activity. `UNSCORABLE` means this activity could not be scored for some reason - commonly because there is not enough user metric data for the time range.

Sleep.description: The collection of records in this page.

baseline_milli.description: The amount of sleep a user needed based on historical trends

need_from_sleep_debt_milli.description: The difference between the amount of sleep the user's body required and the amount the user actually got

externalDocs.description: WHOOP Locker - What is Sleep Debt & How Do You Catch Up on Sleep?

need_from_recent_strain_milli.description: Additional sleep need accrued based on the user's strain

need_from_recent_nap_milli.description: Reduction in sleep need accrued based on the user's recent nap activity (negative value or zero)

SleepNeeded.description: Breakdown of the amount of sleep a user needed before the sleep activity. Summing all individual components results in the amount of sleep the user needed prior to this sleep activity

respiratory_rate.description: The user's respiratory rate during the sleep.

sleep_performance_percentage.description: A percentage (0-100%) of the time a user is asleep over the amount of sleep the user needed. May not be reported if WHOOP does not have enough data about a user yet to calculate Sleep Need.

sleep_consistency_percentage.description: Percentage (0-100%) of how similar this sleep and wake times compared to the previous day. May not be reported if WHOOP does not have enough sleep data about a user yet to understand consistency.

externalDocs.description: WHOOP Locker - What is Sleep Consistency?

sleep_efficiency_percentage.description: A percentage (0-100%) of the time you spend in bed that you are actually asleep.

externalDocs.description: WHOOP Locker - Sleep Efficiency: What is It, How Do You Stack Up & How Can You Improve?

SleepScore.description: WHOOP's measurements and evaluation of the sleep activity. Only present if the Sleep State is `SCORED`

total_in_bed_time_milli.description: Total time the user spent in bed, in milliseconds

total_awake_time_milli.description: Total time the user spent awake, in milliseconds

total_no_data_time_milli.description: Total time WHOOP did not receive data from the user during the sleep, in milliseconds

total_light_sleep_time_milli.description: Total time the user spent in light sleep, in milliseconds

total_slow_wave_sleep_time_milli.description: Total time the user spent in Slow Wave Sleep (SWS), in milliseconds

total_rem_sleep_time_milli.description: Total time the user spent in Rapid Eye Movement (REM) sleep, in milliseconds

sleep_cycle_count.description: Number of sleep cycles during the user's sleep

disturbance_count.description: Number of times the user was disturbed during sleep

cycle_id.description: The Recovery represents how recovered the user is for this physiological cycle

sleep_id.description: ID of the Sleep associated with the Recovery

user_id.description: The WHOOP User for the recovery

created_at.description: The time the recovery was recorded in WHOOP

updated_at.description: The time the recovery was last updated in WHOOP

score_state.description: `SCORED` means the recovery was scored and the measurement values will be present. `PENDING_SCORE` means WHOOP is currently evaluating the cycle. `UNSCORABLE` means this activity could not be scored for some reason - commonly because there is not enough user metric data for the time range.

records.description: The collection of records in this page.

next_token.description: A token that can be used on the next request to access the next page of records. If the token is not present, there are no more records in the collection.

RecoveryCollection.description: Paginated collection of recovery activities with next token for pagination

user_calibrating.description: True if the user is still calibrating and not enough data is available in WHOOP to provide an accurate recovery.

recovery_score.description: Percentage (0-100%) that reflects how well prepared the user's body is to take on Strain. The Recovery score is a measure of the user body's "return to baseline" after a stressor.

hrv_rmssd_milli.description: The user's Heart Rate Variability measured using Root Mean Square of Successive Differences (RMSSD), in milliseconds.

spo2_percentage.description: The percentage of oxygen in the user's blood. Only present if the user is on 4.0 or greater.

skin_temp_celsius.description: The user's skin temperature, in Celsius. Only present if the user is on 4.0 or greater.

RecoveryScore.description: WHOOP's measurements and evaluation of the recovery. Only present if the Recovery State is `SCORED`

records.description: The collection of records in this page.

next_token.description: A token that can be used on the next request to access the next page of records. If the token is not present, there are no more records in the collection.

max_heart_rate.description: The max heart rate WHOOP calculated for the user

externalDocs.description: WHOOP Locker: Understanding Max Heart Rate and Why It Matters for Training

strain.description: WHOOP metric of the cardiovascular load - the level of strain the workout had on the user's cardiovascular system based on the user's heart rate. Strain is scored on a scale from 0 to 21.

average_heart_rate.description: The user's average heart rate (beats per minute) during the workout.

max_heart_rate.description: The user's max heart rate (beats per minute) during the workout.

kilojoule.description: Kilojoules the user expended during the workout.

percent_recorded.description: Percentage (0-100%) of heart rate data WHOOP received during the workout.

distance_meter.description: The distance the user travelled during the workout. Only present if distance data sent to WHOOP

altitude_gain_meter.description: The altitude gained during the workout. This measurement does not account for downward travel - it is strictly a measure of altitude climbed. If a member climbed up and down a 1,000 meter mountain, ending at the same altitude, this measurement would be 1,000 meters. Only present if altitude data is included as part of the workout

altitude_change_meter.description: The altitude difference between the start and end points of the workout. If a member climbed up and down a mountain, ending at the same altitude, this measurement would be 0. Only present if altitude data is included as part of the workout

WorkoutScore.description: WHOOP's measurements and evaluation of the workout activity. Only present if the Workout State is `SCORED`

id.description: Unique identifier for the workout activity

v1_id.description: Previous generation identifier for the activity. Will not exist past 09/01/2025

user_id.description: The WHOOP User who performed the workout

created_at.description: The time the workout activity was recorded in WHOOP

updated_at.description: The time the workout activity was last updated in WHOOP

start.description: Start time bound of the workout

end.description: End time bound of the workout

timezone_offset.description: The user's timezone offset at the time the workout was recorded. Follows format for Time Zone Designator (TZD) - '+hh:mm', '-hh:mm', or 'Z'.

externalDocs.description: Learn more about the Time Zone Designator from the W3C Standard

sport_name.description: Name of the WHOOP Sport performed during the workout

score_state.description: `SCORED` means the workout activity was scored and the measurement values will be present. `PENDING_SCORE` means WHOOP is currently evaluating the workout activity. `UNSCORABLE` means this activity could not be scored for some reason - commonly because there is not enough user metric data for the time range.

sport_id.description: ID of the WHOOP Sport performed during the workout. Will not exist past 09/01/2025

WorkoutV2.description: A WHOOP workout activity with full details and scoring information

zone_zero_milli.description: Duration in milliseconds spent in Zone 0 (very light activity)

zone_one_milli.description: Duration in milliseconds spent in Zone 1 (light activity)

zone_two_milli.description: Duration in milliseconds spent in Zone 2 (moderate activity)

zone_three_milli.description: Duration in milliseconds spent in Zone 3 (hard activity)

zone_four_milli.description: Duration in milliseconds spent in Zone 4 (very hard activity)

zone_five_milli.description: Duration in milliseconds spent in Zone 5 (maximum effort)

ZoneDurations.description: Breakdown of time spent in each heart rate zone during the workout.

externalDocs.description: WHOOP Locker - Training with Heart Rate Zones

records.description: The collection of records in this page.

next_token.description: A token that can be used on the next request to access the next page of records. If the token is not present, there are no more records in the collection.

WorkoutCollection.description: Paginated collection of workout activities with next token for pagination

scopes.read:recovery: Read Recovery data, including score, heart rate variability, and resting heart rate.
scopes.read:cycles: Read cycles data, including day Strain and average heart rate during a physiological cycle.
scopes.read:workout: Read workout data, including activity Strain and average heart rate.
scopes.read:sleep: Read sleep data, including performance % and duration per sleep stage.
scopes.read:profile: Read profile data, including name and email.
scopes.read:body_measurement: Read body measurements data, including height, weight, and max heart rate.
